#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstdio>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
unsigned long long fib (unsigned long long n,unsigned long long m)
{
	unsigned long long a=1,b=1,c=0,count=0;
	while(c<=m)
	{
		c=a+b;
		a=b;
		b=c;
		if(c>=n)count++;
	}
	return --count;
}
int main()
{
	unsigned long long n,m,result;
	cin>>n>>m;
	while(n!=0&&m!=0)
	{
		result=fib(n,m);
		cout<<result<<endl;
		cin>>n>>m;
	}
	return 0;
}
